txt.en: 'According to your own documentation, the mirrors seem to be pointed at one another from the four corners of the Twenty-first Hall. The only one that doesn't match the others is the third.\n\n'I wonder... would you be so good as to return to the third mirror, and give it a little push? I would like to see what happens if the angles align.'
'Aha! Light! I knew it; the mirrors are an ancient light-system of Moria. This technology is brilliant, but it has long been forgotten. What an incredible discovery!'
'Have you tried to swivel that mirror?'
Darri wants you to find out if his theory is correct by going back to the third mirror and swinging its angle to match the others.
Swivel the third mirror to match the others
The third mirror is in the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should angle the third mirror to match the angles of its brethren.
Darri can be found in the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should return to Darri and tell him what happened when you swivelled the mirror.
